summary: An FBI 302 form documenting an interview with a female victim (name redacted) regarding her interactions with Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. The victim describes being recruited, groomed, and subjected to inappropriate touching and sexualized massages during trips to New York and Epstein's New Mexico ranch in 2006.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The financier who recruited the victim, purchased travel and gifts, and engaged in inappropriate touching and grooming behavior during her visits to New York and his New Mexico ranch.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Epstein's companion who assisted in recruiting the victim, participated in activities at the New Mexico ranch, and performed an inappropriate massage on the victim.

connections.description: Acted together to recruit, groom, and create uncomfortable situations for the victim during her stay at the New Mexico ranch. The victim surmised they were a couple based on their interactions.
Epstein recruited, groomed, and engaged in inappropriate touching and behavior with the victim, who was the sister of an employee.
Maxwell assisted Epstein in grooming, performed an inappropriate massage on the victim, and was present during other uncomfortable incidents.

events.title: Victim's Christmas Break Visit to New York
events.description: The victim met Epstein during her Christmas break after being invited by her sister. Epstein purchased her ticket, took her to see Phantom of the Opera, gave a tour of his residence emphasizing the size of his shower, and during a movie held her hand and engaged in inappropriate touching.

events.title: Trip to Epstein's New Mexico Ranch
events.description: The victim traveled to Epstein's ranch in New Mexico, where she was the only guest. Events included shopping, horseback riding, an inappropriate foot massage demonstration by Maxwell, a full-body massage by Maxwell with Epstein present, Epstein getting into bed to 'cuddle' her, and further inappropriate touching during a movie.

events.title: FBI Interview of Victim
events.description: The victim was interviewed by the FBI as part of a federal investigation into the sexual exploitation of minors. She provided detailed information about her experiences with Epstein and Maxwell.

keyFacts: The victim was recruited through her sister, who was employed by Jeffrey Epstein.
Epstein and Maxwell groomed the victim with offers to pay for overseas travel and assist with college plans.
At Epstein's New Mexico ranch, Maxwell performed a massage on the victim, exposing her breasts, while Epstein was present and conversing.
Epstein got into bed with the victim at the ranch, under the covers, to 'cuddle' while she was in her pajamas.
The victim did not initially report the abuse because she did not want to jeopardize her sister's employment and viewed Epstein and Maxwell as role models.
